# Module: tf.sysconfig

System configuration library.

<!-- Placeholder for "Used in" -->


## Functions

[`get_compile_flags(...)`](../tf/sysconfig/get_compile_flags): Get the compilation flags for custom operators.

[`get_include(...)`](../tf/sysconfig/get_include): Get the directory containing the TensorFlow C++ header files.

[`get_lib(...)`](../tf/sysconfig/get_lib): Get the directory containing the TensorFlow framework library.

[`get_link_flags(...)`](../tf/sysconfig/get_link_flags): Get the link flags for custom operators.
